name: Exclusive MBA Event - QS Connect MBA Lisboa
content: QS Quacquarelli Symonds, responsible for publishing the Global MBA Rankings, will return to Lisbon on March 12 with QS Connect MBA, an international event that passes through more than 85 cities every year. Participants have the opportunity to receive the guidance of our expert consultants and schedule individual and personalized sessions with representatives from some of the most renowned management schools. During the event: Apply for more than â‚¬ 6 million in scholarships; Receive a curriculum analysis; Take a professional photo for your profile on LinkedIn; And much more - all for free! Participating schools: Alliance Manchester, Copenhagen Business School, IE, ESADE, ESCP Madrid, Hult, IESE, ISEG, The Lisbon MBA, Sauder, Warwick, Shanghai Jiao Tong University - Antai College of Economics and Management and Singapore Management University. Register for free today and guarantee your vacancy! URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/364492-1?pid=4868 Time: 6:00 pm - 9:30 pm Price: Free entrance: USD 0.0 Venue Details: Altis Grand Hotel, Rua Castilho, 11, 1269-072, Lisboa, Portugal
